==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
[[皇]] ("august") + [[祖]] ("ancestral") + [[妣]] ("[deceased] mother")

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=huángzǔbǐ
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a posthumous name for [[grandmother]]s in [[w:ancestor veneration in China|Zhou rituals]]
#* The ''[[w:Book of Rites|Book of Rites]]'', Qu Li II, 122:
#*: 祭王父曰[[皇祖考]]，王母曰'''皇祖妣'''。父曰皇考，母曰皇妣。夫曰皇辟。生曰父、曰母、曰妻，死曰考、曰妣、曰嬪。
#*: ''In sacrificing to them, a grandfather is called 'the sovereign grandfather'; a grandmother, ''''the sovereign grandmother''''; a father, 'the sovereign father'; a mother, 'the sovereign mother; a husband, 'the sovereign [[辟|pattern]].' While alive, the names of '[[父|father]]', '[[母|mother]]', and '[[妻|wife]]' are used; when they are dead, those of 'the completed one', '[[妣|the corresponding one]]', and '[[嬪|the honored one]]'.''

[[zh:皇祖妣]]
